question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about the Poona Pact?
option1: It was the agreement between Jawaharlal Nehru and Dr. B R. Ambedkar
option2: The depressed classes agreed to adhere to the principle of Joint Electorate
option3: Seats were to be allotted to the depressed classes in the provincial legislatures
option4: It provided for adequate representation of the depressed classes in the civil services
answer: It was the agreement between Jawaharlal Nehru and Dr. B R. Ambedkar
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Poona Pact was an agreement between Mahatma Gandhi and Dr. B R. Â Ambedkar
